page.title: 15NEWCHURCH-1
page.content: Newchurch is a small village. In some parts there are no pavements as is usual in a small island village. Newchurch is built around its church which had been originally built in the early 11th century. It was{SAXON. Newchurch is centred around the Shoot. The houses in Newchurch vary in age and the older houses are mostly {VICTORIAN}but there are quite a few houses built in the 1920's. The new houses are not older than 10 years old and some have just been built. The pub in Newchurch is called The Pointer. In the part of the village that is nearest to Sandown there is a very old building that is now a cottage but looks like it was once an 18th century tavern. Most of the land around Newchurch is farm land but there is some rough land and boggy places.
